Kam vse s sv. Martinom
07 Nov 2019, 12:13 by Uredništvo

Pred vrati je praznik sv. Martina, ko se mošt spremeni v vino in nastopi čas za pokušine novega letnika. Na martinovo in v dnevih pred praznikom bo pestro po vsej Primorski. Pripravili smo pregled javnih prireditev v slovenski Istri, na severnem Primorskem, na kraško-brkinskem koncu ter v zamejstvu, kamor se lahko odpravite na pokušino vina in na z njo povezana rajanja.



Utrinek z lanskoletnega martinovanja v Šmartnem Foto: Andrej Colja

PRIMORSKA > Na martinovo se pripravljajo v vseh štirih istrskih občinah. Ena izmed tradicionalnih prireditev je Martinja v Marezigah, kjer bo živahno od jutri do nedelje.
Razglasili bodo botre in kronali kraljico
Konec tedna bodo martinovo proslavili tudi v šotoru na parkirišču ob koprskem stadionu. Jutri bosta ob mladem vinu občinstvo zabavali skupini Mambo Kings in Tequila, v soboto Luka Basi in skupina Gedore, v nedeljo pa klape Capris, Solinar in Semikantà.
V kleti Vinakoper bodo jutri ves dan možni vodeni ogledi vinske kleti in degustacije. Od 14. ure dalje bo v vinskem butiku “afterwork party”, od 17. ure dalje pa bo v Hiši refoška martinova degustacija z razglasitvijo vinskih botrov, kronanjem nove vinske kraljice slovenske Istre, kulinaričnim razvajanjem, ob mladem vinu pa ne bo manjkal niti kostanj.
Po njem bo jutri dišalo tudi na Gažonu, kjer bodo pokušino mladega vina pospremili s kostanjado. V soboto bodo martinovanje in Martinov pohod organizirali v Sečovljah, v nedeljo, 10. novembra, pa bo živahno tudi v Izoli, kjer se bodo med 13. in 19. uro predstavili pridelovalci lokalnih vin z vsemi svojimi žlahtnimi sortami in drugimi priboljški.
Za druženje ob mladih vinih lokalnih vinarjev, pečenem kostanju in živi glasbi so poskrbeli tudi v Ankaranu, in sicer v soboto od 18. ure dalje na osrednjem trgu.
Do kleti na Krasu kar z avtobusom
Na Krasu se bo martinov vikend pričel že jutri, ko bodo v Štanjelu ocenjevali mlada vina ter na simpoziju o teranu in kraških dobrotah spregovorili o trajnostnem razvoju kmetijstva in turizma na čezmejnem Krasu. Isti dan v Pliskovici pripravljajo vodene sprehode po vasi z degustacijo mladih vin in drugih dobrot. Največ obiskovalcev na Krasu pa vendarle pričakujejo v soboto, ko bodo več kot 20 vinskih kleti na Kraški vinski cesti znova povezali z avtobusnim prevozom. Poleg odprtih kleti bo najbolj pestro dogajanje v Štanjelu, kjer bodo v soboto ob 13. uri blagoslovili mošt in podelili nagrade najbolje uvrščenim vinarjem na petkovem ocenjevanju vin.
Pri Kraški hiši bo za glasbeno spremljavo poskrbela skupina Počeni škafi. Tako v soboto kot tudi v nedeljo se bodo na grajskem dvorišču predstavili vinarji in ponudniki lokalnih dobrot, za obiskovalce pa bodo organizirani tudi vodeni ogledi. Sobotno martinovanje se bo zaključilo v Sežani pod šotorom, kjer bosta nastopili skupini Jastrebi in Mambo Kings.
Martinove furenge in fure
Eno največjih javnih martinovanj bo v soboto in v nedeljo v Šmartnem v Goriških brdih. Oba dneva se program začenja ob 10. uri, v ospredju bodo degustacije, krst vina pa bo v soboto ob 15. uri.
Še en blagoslov bo ob 20.30 uri na prostoru Čelo pri Neblem, kjer martinovanje ob 19.30 prireja društvo Briške busklce. Tudi tokrat bo dobrodelno. V nedeljo bo še Martinov pohod. Start bo ob 8.30 v vili Vipolže, dogodek bo trajal šest ur, hoje bo za tri.
Martinovanje v Bukovici, se v soboto začne ob 13. uri. Izpred kulturnega doma bo na pot šla Martinova furenga, ob 19. uri bo v domu rajanje. Društvo vinogradnikov in vinarjev Brje prireja jutri od 15. ure dan odprtih kleti s pokušino brejskih vin in martinovih dobrot, sledil bo koncert. V nedeljo bo Martinova kolesarska fura z gorskim kolesarjem Aljažem Kodričem. Konjeniško društvo Sveti Štefan Vipavska dolina jutri prireja Martinovo furengo, blagoslov mladega vina bo ob 15. uri na Glavnem trgu v Vipavi.
V grajski kleti v Ložah bo martinovanje ob 18. uri, ljubitelji kolesarjenja pa se lahko ob 9. uri odpravijo na 50-kilometrsko Martinovo furo s Kristijanom Korenom. Martinovo naznanja tudi začetek 21. sezone vinsko kulinarične prireditve Vinski hrami Vipavske doline. S furengo bodo od 11. do 17. ure martinovali tudi v Šempetru.
Na Proseku zdravica s prosekarjem
Ob martinovem bo živahno tudi na Proseku, kjer se bodo dogodki vrstili od danes do ponedeljka. Z letošnjim prosekarjem bodo danes ob 19. uri nazdravili v Domu prosekarja, kjer bodo jutri ob 18. uri na okrogli mizi spregovorile ženske pridelovalke vina. Po sobotnem dopoldanskem šahovskem turnirju, predstavitvi z degustacijo prosekarjev in večerni zabavi bo v nedeljo ob 10. uri izpred spomenika padlim krenil tretji orientacijski tek Lov na prosekarja. V nedeljo bo na prenovljenem Placu pred cerkvijo sv. Martina zaživel tudi sejem lokalnih proizvodov, od 14.30 pa se bo po vaških ulicah vila martinova furenga. Ob 16.30 bodo v Kulturnem domu vitezi in kraljice vina krstili letošnji prosekar.
Zares pa bo šlo v ponedeljek, na dan sv. Martina, ko bodo v jutranjih urah proseške ulice napolnile raznovrstne stojnice: na Kržadi bo kmetijski sejem, na Balancu pa obrtniški in bolšji sejem. Priložnost za degustacijo (in ocenjevanje) vin lokalnih proizvajalcev bo ob 14.30 v Domu prosekarja, kjer bo ob 19. uri razglasitev zmagovalcev. Kot vsako leto bodo tudi letos na Proseku vse do ponedeljka odprte osmice, na Mandriji pa bo deloval lunapark.



Poleg odprtih kraških kleti bo pestro tudi v Štanjelu, kjer bodo v soboto blagoslovili mošt in podelili nagrade vinarjem. Foto: Samanta Coraci



Kot veleva tradicija, bo v Vipavi Konjeniško društvo Sveti Štefan tudi letos pripravilo Martinovo furengo z blagoslovom mladega vina. Foto: Alenka Tratnik

Where is everything from St. Martin
07 Nov 2019, 12:13 by Uredništvo

Before the door is the feast of St. Martin, when the must turns into wine and it is time to try a new vintage. On St. Martin's Day and in the days before the holiday, there will be a variety of events throughout Primorska. We have prepared an overview of public events in Slovenian Istria, northern Primorska, the Karst-Brkini region and abroad, where you can go for a taste of wine and related paradise.



An Impact Of Last Year's Martination In Smartno Photo: Andrej Colja

PRIMORSKA> Martin is being prepared in all four Istrian municipalities. One of the traditional events is Martini in Marezig, where it will be lively from tomorrow to Sunday.
They will declare godparents and crown the Queen
At the end of the week they will celebrate Martin's Day in a tent in the parking lot next to the Koper Stadium. Tomorrow, with young wine, audiences will entertain the Mambo Kings and Tequila bands, on Saturday Luka Basi and the Gedore group, and on Sunday the Capris, Solinar and Semikantà bands.
Guided tours of the wine cellar and tastings will be possible tomorrow at the Vinakoper cellar. After 2 pm there will be an afterwork party in the wine boutique, and from 5.00 pm there will be a Martin's tasting at the House with the proclamation of wine gods, the crowning of the new wine queen of Slovenian Istria, culinary pampering, and no young chestnuts .
After it, tomorrow it will also smell on Gažon, where a tasting of young wine will be accompanied by chestnuts. On Saturday, Martinis and Martin's march will be organized in Secovlje, and on Sunday, November 10th, Izola will be lively, where local wine producers with all their noble varieties and other delicacies will be presented between 1pm and 7pm.
Socializing with young wines from local winemakers, roasting chestnuts and live music was also provided in Ankaran on Saturday from 6pm on Central Square.
To the basement in the Karst by bus
In Karst, Martin's weekend will start tomorrow, when young wines will be evaluated in Štanjel and a symposium on teran and Karst delicacies will be discussed on sustainable development of agriculture and tourism in the cross-border Karst. On the same day in Pliskovica they organize guided walks around the village with tasting of young wines and other delicacies. However, most visitors to the Karst are expecting Saturday, when more than 20 wine cellars on the Karst Wine Road will be reconnected with bus transport. Beside the open cellars, there will be the most varied event in Štanjel, where on Saturday at 1pm they will bless the must and give awards to the best-ranked winemakers at Friday's wine evaluation.
At the Karst House, the group Start the Bars will provide musical accompaniment. Both Saturday and Sunday will feature winemakers and local delicacies in the courtyard of the castle, and guided tours will be organized for visitors. Saturday's martination will end in Sežana under the tent, where the Hawks and Mambo Kings will perform.
Martin furenge and furen
One of the biggest public celebrations will be on Saturday and Sunday in Smartno in the Goriška Brda. On both days, the program starts at 10am, with tastings in the forefront, and a baptism of wine on Saturday at 3pm.
Another blessing will be at 8:30 pm at the Čelo pri Neblem area, where the St. Martin's Day celebration at 7:30 pm is organized by the Brisk Busklce Society. It will be charitable again this time. There will also be a Martin hike on Sunday. The start will be at 8:30 at the Vipolže Villa, the event will last for six hours, and the walk will take three.
St. Martin's Day in Bukovica begins on Saturday at 1pm. Martin Furenga will take the stage in front of the cultural home, at 7pm there will be a birth in the home. The Brje Winegrowers and Winemakers Association is organizing an open cellar tomorrow, starting at 3pm, with a taste of Brey's wines and Martin's delicacies, followed by a concert. On Sunday, Martin's cycling race will be held with mountain biker Aljaž Kodrič. The St. Stephen's Equestrian Society The Vipava Valley is hosting a Martin Furengo tomorrow, the blessing of young wine will be at 3pm on Main Square in Vipava.
In the castle cellar in Lože there will be a martinisation at 6pm, and cycling enthusiasts can head to the Martin Martin Fur with Christian Koren at 9am. Martin also announces the beginning of the 21st season of the culinary event of the Wine Temple of the Vipava Valley. From furengo they will also be martinized in Šempeter from 11am to 5pm.
On the Toast Average with the Average
Martin's will also be lively on Prosek, where events will take place from today until Monday. With this year's cheesemaker, they will be toasting at 7pm today at the Prosecution House, where tomorrow at 6pm women's wine producers will speak at the round table. After Saturday morning's chess tournament, a presentation by tasting the medievalists and an evening party, the third orienteering hunt for the medieval man will start in front of the fall on Sunday at 10 am. On Sunday, it will be on the renovated Plac in front of St. Martin will also launch a local produce fair, and from 2.30pm there will be a martin furen in the village streets. At 4.30pm, the Knights and Queen of Wine will be baptized this year by the average in the Cultural Center.
But it will really be on Monday, the day of St. St. Martin's Day, when in the morning hours the average streets will be filled with various stands: in Kržada there will be an agricultural fair, and in Balanec there will be an artisan and flea market. An opportunity for tasting (and judging) wines from local producers will be at 2.30pm at the Prosecution House, where the winners will be announced at 7pm. As every year, the Eight will be open on Mondays until Monday until Monday, and a amusement park will operate on Mandria.
